entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local blowing snow late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
